foundryvtt-coloredeffects.overlayColor.h: Color for overlay icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
foundryvtt-coloredeffects.overlayAlpha.h: Opacity of overlay icons (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
foundryvtt-coloredeffects.statusBackgrou: Background color of status icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
Opacity of status icon background (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
foundryvtt-coloredeffects.statusBorderCo: Color of status icon border as a hex string (rrggbb)
foundryvtt-coloredeffects.statusBorderWi: Width in pixels of status icon border
foundryvtt-coloredeffects.statusColor.hi: Color for status icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
foundryvtt-coloredeffects.statusAlpha.hi: Opacity of status icons (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
